title: Vida Vacations Resort at Vallarta Nayarit Featured in Upcoming Season Finale of ABC's Bachelor In Paradise
text:
Vida Vacations
NUEVO VALLARTA, Mexico , Sept. 8, Vidanta resort at Vallarta Nayarit, a premier luxury beach destination from Vida Vacations, will be featured in the upcoming season finale episodes of ABC's summer reality series Bachelor in Paradise. One lucky couple will enjoy intimate experiences at the award-winning Vida Vacations' Grand Luxxe resort including a romantic overnight date in a "Fantasy Suite" Grand Luxxe Residence Loft. The episodes are scheduled to air Sunday and Monday, September 6 th and 7th, 2015, at 8/7c on ABC.
The contestants will spend the night in the ultimate lap of luxury in one of Vida Vacations' Grand Luxxe three bedroom lofts. Each loft includes standard amenities such as a kitchen, breakfast bar, laundry room with washer and dryer, dining table, and living room with TV. The sumptuous living accommodations have three bedrooms, featuring a total of two king-size beds and two double beds, as well as three-and-a-half bathrooms, including two Jacuzzi tubs. Each unit is draped in fine linens and features marble, granite and fine stonework throughout to create the ultimate romantic getaway location.
Not to be outdone by the interior, the lavish terrace includes an inviting, private dipping pool, dining table to experience majestic sunrises and sunsets, as well as daybeds and chairs to unwind after a long day in paradise. The suites are the epitome of elegance, which can only be created by Vida Vacations.
From the creator of The Bachelor franchise, summer series Bachelor in Paradise features some of The Bachelor' s biggest stars and most talked about villains in the history of the show. They all left The Bachelor or The Bachelorette scorned by the people they loved, and on Bachelor in Paradise they'll get a second chance to find their soul mates. For six weeks, the group will live together in Mexico in an isolated romantic paradise and will explore new relationships, fall in love or be cast aside once more. The romantic dating series airs Sundays and Mondays ( 8:00 p.m., ET ) on ABC.
The Grand Luxxe is a five-diamond resort with locations in both Riviera Maya and Nuevo Vallarta . Both locations offer lush gardens, superior accommodations and award winning cuisine by world renowned chefs and restauranteurs.
In addition to the spectacular entertainment and dining offerings at the Grand Luxxe resorts, guests at the Vidanta resort in Vallarta Nayarit can enjoy the Jack Nicklaus Academy of Golf and a Nicklaus Design golf course, Spatium spa services, private beaches and pools, as well as family friendly accommodations and amenities.
About Vida Vacations
Vida Vacations is a luxury destination club that offers access to a collection of the finest resorts, spas and golf courses in the world. Vida Vacations is the gateway to exclusive Vidanta destinations and resorts, including Grand Luxxe, The Grand Bliss, The Grand Mayan, The Bliss, Mayan Palace, and Sea Garden. Visit us at www. vidavacations.com .
About Grupo Vidanta
Grupo Vidanta is a full-service tourism developer in Mexico and Latin America with practices in property architecture and product design, construction and operations. The company specializes in the development and operation of luxury resort and hotel brands in Mexico and counts AAA Five Diamond Award-winning Grand Luxxe Nuevo Vallarta and five AAA Four Diamond Award-winning resorts – Grand Luxxe Riviera Maya, The Grand Bliss Nuevo Vallarta, The Grand Mayan Nuevo Vallarta, The Grand Mayan Riviera Maya and The Grand Mayan Acapulco – among its impressive portfolio of more than 25 resorts and hotels.
Grupo Vidanta's visionary approach to the development of luxury beach destinations brings vacation dreams to life via membership-based resorts and mega-resorts on the coastlines of Mexico's most sought-after locations – Nuevo Vallarta , Riviera Maya, Los Cabos , Acapulco , Puerto Penasco , Puerto Vallarta and Mazatlan – with brands including Grand Luxxe, The Grand Bliss, The Grand Mayan, The Bliss, Mayan Palace, Ocean Breeze and Sea Garden, and more in development.
The company, which employs more than 15,000 individuals dedicated to design, development, construction and operations, is consistently recognized as one of the most revered employers in Latin America . Vidanta Golf is the largest operator of golf courses in Mexico , the real estate division has built and sold more than 2,000 vacation luxury homes, and the company is responsible for developing Mexico's first privately built and owned airport, Mar de Cortes International Airport in Puerto Penasco .
Grupo Vidanta was founded by Daniel Chavez Moran in 1974 and operates two foundations to enrich the lives of Latin Americans. For more information about Grupo Vidanta, visit http://www.grupovidanta.com .
ABOUT BACHELOR IN PARADISE
From the creator of the Bachelor franchise, and hosted by Chris Harrison , it's Bachelor in Paradise . Some of The Bachelor' s biggest stars and villains are back. They all left The Bachelor or The Bachelorette with broken hearts but now they know what it really takes to find love, and on Bachelor in Paradise they'll get a second chance to find their soul mates. From Next Entertainment in association with Warner Horizon Television, the series is executive produced by Mike Fleiss , Martin Hilton , Alycia Rossiter , Nicole Woods , Peter J. Scalettar and Elan Gale.
For more information on Bachelor in Paradise, visit http://abc.go.com/shows/bachelor-in-paradise .
